ygData.subject: Re: Enchant Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Castle Mistmoore is an extremely high level zone off of Lesser Faydark in the South West Corner. I don t believe that you will find anyone selling any spells
ygData.messageBody:
Castle Mistmoore is an extremely high level zone off of Lesser Faydark in
the South West Corner. I don't believe that you will find anyone selling
any spells there. I know a Level 35 Cleric that has some quite a few
problems in there. VERY HIGH LEVEL.

At 02:26 PM 4/22/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Eain Bankins <eain@...>
>
>Where is this castle?!
>
>-Bukaru, Teir'Dal Enchanter, Test Server
>
>Daniel Devorkin wrote:
>>
>> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>>
>> you heard right, that is the only known location so far, though i do have a
>> theory.
>> I have recently found a place called Castle (something)mist. This castle is
>> inhabited only by Dark ELf (Or drow as i like to call them)
>> I was invisible when i went here, but my theory is that this place might
>> also sell it :/ I am not sure though.
>> I did not want to stick around long enough for my inviso to wear off. not
>> only were there Drow, but Gargoyles as well, and everything conned Red
to me
>> :/ and i am level 10 now. So i wount be going back there anytime soon!
>>
>> -Aeramus (Bristlebane server)
>>
